turkish_example_sentence: Onlar dün gece harika bir konser yapacaklardı ama elektrik kesintisi oldu.
english_example_sentence: They were going to do a wonderful concert last night but there was a power outage.
russian_example_sentence: Они собирались делать чудесный концерт вчера ночью, но произошло отключение электричества.
